original_title: Quest: Episode III - Dawn of Iris
overview: Is it Alan? Veronica? Darren? Toobaadooshee? Or Binky?  The chase continues as Darren and his villainous cohort, consisting of the sassy Toobaadooshee and the bouncy Binky, endure their quest for the Bars of Elements.  Alan and Veronica face off against perilous odds to protect the fabled artefact from evil.  But there is a traitor mong them that will betray them all...
tagline: Who is the traitor AMONG US?
title: Quest: Episode III - Dawn of Iris
